title: Harrowing Poro!
body:
So I originally had this idea planned out as a Shadow Isle Poro.  I never quite got around to finishing it around that time until I realized it's October and that the Harrowing is arriving! I decided to dedicate this Poro to the Harrowing Poros.  What do you guys think?
I want it known it's my first successful attempt at taking a drawing and turning it into a digital painting, so I'm very proud :D
